about_the_game:
Game features:

-Learn new languages: You will learn dozen of languages from your mother-in-game: Japanese, British English, American English, Cantonese, Minnan, Northeastern, Shanghainese and more.

-Discover mysterious mothers: When you open the game, there is a chance that a mysterious mother will appear, such as a Japanese Yakuza mother.

-Remote greetings with multiple players: Your mother can visit your friend’s mother and spend unforgettable time together.

-Support "Steam Workshop": create your favourite mother character.

Instructions:
-Click the character to open the menu.
-The character's gaze will follow the movement of your mouse.
-Supports character dragging (left mouse button) and zooming in and out (using the mouse wheel during dragging), but please do not block mother from watching TV.
-You can switch the screen where the character is located in a dual-screen situation through the following operations: "win key" + "shift" + left and right keys.

Join our community to receive more love and kindness from mothers. With your support, we can continue to make more games about moms.
